snippet: “Beautiful Province,” a new play by Clarence Coo, is the winner of the 2012 Yale Drama Series award for an emerging playwright, the judge for the series, John Guare, is to announce on Monday.
abstract: Clarence Coo play Beautiful Province wins the 2012 Yale Drama Series award for an emerging playwright.
lead_paragraph: “Beautiful Province,” a new play by Clarence Coo, is the winner of the 2012 Yale Drama Series award for an emerging playwright, the judge for the series, John Guare, is to announce on Monday.
